metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Poison has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Melodic Complexity and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Poison has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Mixolydian, D Minor,  and G Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
